AD.name: Sling Resource Type
AD.description: Sling Resource Type of the HomePage Component or Components.

AD.name: Include Last Modified
AD.description: If true, the last modified value will be included in the sitemap.

AD.name: Include Inheritance Property
AD.description: If true searches for the frequency and priority attribute in the current page if null looks in the parent.

AD.name: Change Frequency Properties
AD.description: The set of JCR property names which will contain the change frequency value.

AD.name: Priority Properties
AD.description: The set of JCR property names which will contain the priority value.

AD.name: DAM Folder Property
AD.description: The JCR property name which will contain DAM folders to include in the sitemap.

AD.name: DAM Asset MIME Types
AD.description: MIME types allowed for DAM assets.

AD.name: Exclude from External (xml) Sitemap Property
AD.description: The boolean [cq:Page]/jcr:content property name which indicates if the Page should be hidden from the xml Sitemap. Default value: hideInXml

AD.name: Exclude from Internal (html) Sitemap Property
AD.description: The boolean [cq:Page]/jcr:content property name which indicates if the Page should be hidden from the html Sitemap. Default value: hideInHtml

AD.name: DEFAULT_EXTENSIONLESS_URLS
AD.description: TIf true, page links included in sitemap are generated without .html extension and the path is included with a trailing slash, e.g. /content/geometrixx/en/.

AD.name: DEFAULT_REMOVE_TRAILING_SLASH
AD.description: Only relevant if Extensionless URLs is selected. If true, the trailing slash is removed from extensionless page links, e.g. /content/geometrixx/en.

AD.name: Character Encoding
AD.description: TIf not set, the container's default is used (ISO-8859-1 for Jetty)
